title: hc1 Unveils HerCare to Safeguard Maternal Health
body: INDIANAPOLIS, April 15, 2025--hc1 today announced the launch of HerCare, an industry-first module within its MyBloodHealth platform designed to safeguard maternal health by identifying and addressing health risks associated with anemia in pregnancy.
